name: JailRoom
description:
Welcome to the world's smallest jail house! You are the only guard on duty. Keep the peace by stopping prison fights and throwing them in jail. But be careful not to hold prisoners too long or let to many fights slide, your job is on the line!

How to play:

Throw prisoners in the jail cells.  Once they have completed their sentence throw them to the front door.  Make sure to stop any fights you see.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Hold spacebar to pickup prisoner.

Release spacebar to throw them in the direction you are moving.

-Made for the IndieTales Game Jam 2021
